pr_title: KEYCLOAK-13379 added now excluded project files

timeline.message: KEYCLOAK-13379 added now excluded project files

timeline.bodyText:
A trailing comma isn't allowed in JSON:
aszczucz@tyrfing ~> curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/keycloak/keycloak/695864d4b70494a0d24f7c54bf5a4cde2e907c45/themes/src/main/resources/theme/keycloak-preview/account/resources/tsconfig.json | jq '.'

parse error: Expected another array element at line 20, column 3
timeline.author: ASzc

replies.bodyText: So what should we do now when it was already merged? Another follow-up JIRA?? @ssilvert
replies.author: vmuzikar
